document_data.name: Hosgerd Lar
document_data.mainbody: '''Hosgerd Lar''' was a contractor who connected hirings with adventurers in need of help in the town of [[Eveningstar]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Hosgerd was a [[dwarf|dwarvish]] woman with a light skin tone, short blonde hair and clean-shaven face. She wore dress adorned with furs.
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century DR, Hosgerd Lar could be seen dealing with adventurers from the world of [[Eberron]], who set out to investigate the nearby ruins of the [[Haunted Halls]].
